price: Todos ellos desmintieron a los Mensajeros, y merecieron Mi castigo.
arabic: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: in kullun illā kadhaba al-rusula faḥaqqa ʿiqābi
